<template>
  <el-select v-model="value" placeholder="账号选择" :change="btnClick(value)">
    <el-option
      v-for="item in listArr"
      :key="item"
      :label="item"
      :value="item">
    </el-option>
  </el-select>
</template>

<script>
  import request from '../utils/request.ts'
  export default {
    data () {
      return {
        listArr: [],
        value: ''
      }
    },
    created () {
      // 获取网络数据
      this.getData()
    },
    methods: {
      getData () {
        request({
          method: 'get',
          url: 'http://127.0.0.1:8000/id',
          params: {
            page: this.page
          }
        }).then(res => {
            this.listArr = res.data.data
          }
        )
      },
      btnClick (item) {
        this.$emit('item-click', item)
      }
    }
  }
</script>
